snippet: Fortified and sweet wines are often associated with Sunday lunch at the in-laws, which is too bad, because all of these drinks have a place on the table.
abstract: Fortified and sweet wines are often associated with Sunday lunch at the in-laws, which is too bad, because all of these drinks have a place on the table.

headline.main: In Spain, Sherry Is Starting to Flow. In France, Not So Much.
